title: PBE Problems
body:
It is the 3. Of November

I tried ro apply myself ro the PBE but they have a problem 

Idk if that is premenant or what 


Please give me some links,tips and some advice for my sign up 
on the PBE

replies.body: I see that you're application was received but not currently accepted.  We don't have any way to force an application through.  IO also don't have details on how to get accepted beyond the [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ).  I know you've waiting a bit, and I wish you the best of luck!
